title: Leaves from my autography
snippet: 315 Stuart Mentetli, Bart., Mr Baillie Coclirane of Lamington , Mr Walter Buclianan, M.P., Mr Charles Cowan, M.P., Mr James Dodds, and Dr Charles Mackay. The deputation held a conference with the Scottish Members of Parliament, at the Lord Advocate 's apartments, in Spring Gardens. There was a considerable attendance of M.P.'s, and the deputation  was introduced by Mr Charles Cowan, M.P. for Edinburgh.
